beer.beer_description:
Who doesn’t like creamy
chocolate, strong coffee, fragrant spices and a bit of chilli pepper heat? We know you do, but
beware, so does the Chupacabra!

Contains barley malt, oat flakes, lactose, cocoa nibs, coffee, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla bean, Habanero peppers and hops.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s That's 395 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 80!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 5 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 5!
You like it thick and dark. Your beer! What did you think we were talking about? That’s 45 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 10.
